What is (are) Psoriasis ?,"Light therapy, also called phototherapy, uses ultraviolet light to treat skin lesions. Laser therapy delivers intense, focused doses of light to specific areas of the skin to clear lesions without harming surrounding tissues.",NIHSeniorHealth,Psoriasis
